front.title: MP-BGP Extension and the Procedures for IPv4/IPv6 Mapping Advertisement

abstract.t: This document defines NLRI with specific AFI/SAFI combination, a new BGP path attribute known as the "4map6" and a set of related procedures, which can be used for transferring IPv4/IPv6 address mapping rule to support IPv4 service delivery in multi-domain IPv6-only underlay networks.
